author: Sean McCárthaigh
title: Coronavirus: Lack of childcare for health workers creating staffing problems
description: Trade union says lack of Government progress on issue creating additional problems
content:
Health workers have expressed dismay at the Governments failure to act on its promise to provide childcare support for essential medical staff during the coronavirus crisis.
Forsa, the trade union representing over 30,000 hospital and community health worker… [+3311 chars]
